valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 1.7,.  estimated GFR (eGFR) is likely between 41 and 50 mL/min/1.73m2, .  provided the serum creatinine value is stable..  (Patients with more muscle mass and better nutritional status are more .  likely to be at the higher end of this range.).  An eGFR < 60 suggests kidney disease in those below the age of 65 .  and there may be kidney disease in those over 65..
